org.qteam.tinyicon.structs

Class BitmapInfoHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qteam.tinyicon.structs.BitmapInfoHeader

  • public final class BitmapInfoHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    The equivalent class of Microsoft's BITMAPINFOHEADER structure.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bitCount
      Ofs 14 (UINT16) - Bits per pixel (Valid values: 1, 4, 8, 24, 32).
      int clrImportant
      Ofs 36 (UINT32) - The number of color indexes that are required for displaying the bitmap (Unused, should be 0).
      int clrUsed
      Ofs 32 (UINT32) - The number of color indexes in the color table that are actually used by the bitmap (Unused, should be 0).
      int colorCount
      Number of colors in the image.
      int compression
      Ofs 16 (UINT32) - Compression type (Unused, should be 0 = BI_RGB).
      int height
      Ofs 8 (INT32) - Icon height int pixels (Actually it's the sum of heights of 'XOR' and 'AND' bitmaps; real height is halved).
      int imageSize
      Ofs 20 (UINT32) - Image size in bytes.
      int planes
      Ofs 12 (UINT16) - Color planes (Unused, should be 1).
      int size
      Ofs 0 (UINT32) - Size of the BitmapInfoHeader structure (Should be 40).
      int stride
      The sum of image width and padding (if present).
      int width
      Ofs 4 (INT32) - Icon width in pixels.
      int xPelsPerMeter
      Ofs 24 (INT32) - The horizontal resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap (Unused, should be 0).
      int yPelsPerMeter
      Ofs 28 (INT32) - The vertical resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap (Unused, should be 0).

    • Constructor Summary

      protected BitmapInfoHeader(java.lang.String icon_name, byte[] buf, int image_ofs)
      Constructs a new BitmapInfoHeader.

      Returns a string summarizing the state of this BitmapInfoHeader.

    • Field Detail

      • size

        public int size
        Ofs 0 (UINT32) - Size of the BitmapInfoHeader structure (Should be 40).

      • width

        public int width
        Ofs 4 (INT32) - Icon width in pixels.

      • height

        public int height
        Ofs 8 (INT32) - Icon height int pixels (Actually it's the sum of heights of 'XOR' and 'AND' bitmaps; real height is halved).

      • planes

        public int planes
        Ofs 12 (UINT16) - Color planes (Unused, should be 1).

      • bitCount

        public int bitCount
        Ofs 14 (UINT16) - Bits per pixel (Valid values: 1, 4, 8, 24, 32).

      • compression

        public int compression
        Ofs 16 (UINT32) - Compression type (Unused, should be 0 = BI_RGB).

      • imageSize

        public int imageSize
        Ofs 20 (UINT32) - Image size in bytes.

      • xPelsPerMeter

        public int xPelsPerMeter
        Ofs 24 (INT32) - The horizontal resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap (Unused, should be 0).

      • yPelsPerMeter

        public int yPelsPerMeter
        Ofs 28 (INT32) - The vertical resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap (Unused, should be 0).

      • clrUsed

        public int clrUsed
        Ofs 32 (UINT32) - The number of color indexes in the color table that are actually used by the bitmap (Unused, should be 0).

      • clrImportant

        public int clrImportant
        Ofs 36 (UINT32) - The number of color indexes that are required for displaying the bitmap (Unused, should be 0).

      • colorCount

        public final int colorCount
        Number of colors in the image.
        Note that this field is set to true colors (16777216 colors) if bitCount is either 24 or 32 bits.

        -- This is just a convenience field, it isn't a member of the BitmapInfoHeader struct.

      • stride

        public final int stride
        The sum of image width and padding (if present).

        -- This is just a convenience field, it isn't a member of the BitmapInfoHeader struct.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BitmapInfoHeader

        protected BitmapInfoHeader(java.lang.String icon_name,
                           byte[] buf,
                           int image_ofs)
                    throws InvalidIconDataException
        Constructs a new BitmapInfoHeader.
        Parameters:
        icon_name - The name of the icon.
        buf - The buffer that contains the icon data.
        image_ofs - The offset in the buffer where the image data starts.
        Throws:
        InvalidIconDataException - if the icon has wrong bitCount value (e.g. bitCount = 0).

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string summarizing the state of this BitmapInfoHeader.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a summary string.
